_comment: Created by EFisher on 12/10/2015 14:31:55 using v2.7
title: How did patients describe their overall experience of making an appointment?
analysis_commentary: Overall though the majority of patients describe their experience of making an appointment as positive, but this is showing a downward trend over the time periods that the question has been surveyed (79 percent in 2011/12 to 73% in 2013/14)
